title: News Blast
summary: An watch face using Amusing News Stories to tell you the time for Android Wear.
description: A fun watch face using News Stories to tell you the time on Android Wear Devices.Enjoy the latest from outstanding news sources, including 'Well Duh! News', 'We know were you live News', 'Apocalypse News' and DOH! News.  Stay informed...Please remember these are made up news stories for fun, so please DO NOT TAKE SERIOUSLY (by using this watch face you accept full liability and the developer cannot be held responsible for any Panic or Distress or action you may take.)Let the news (made up of course) tell you the time.Configuration options only available through the Android Wear App.★ Show Battery Level★ Show Date★ Select a color of have randomly★ Update news, every wake-up, every 5,15 or 30 minutes.Enjoy, if you wish to have anything added, please EMAIL the developer.To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devicesIf you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
descriptionHTML:
A fun watch face using News Stories to tell you the time on Android Wear Devices.
Enjoy the latest from outstanding news sources, including 'Well Duh! News', 'We know were you live News', 'Apocalypse News' and DOH! News. Stay informed...
Please remember these are made up news stories for fun, so please DO NOT TAKE SERIOUSLY (by using this watch face you accept full liability and the developer cannot be held responsible for any Panic or Distress or action you may take.)

Let the news (made up of course) tell you the time.

Configuration options only available through the Android Wear App.
★ Show Battery Level
★ Show Date
★ Select a color of have randomly
★ Update news, every wake-up, every 5,15 or 30 minutes.

Enjoy, if you wish to have anything added, please EMAIL the developer.

To install please refer to the Wear Support Page.
https://support.google.com/androidwear/answer/6140435

Is compatible with Android Wear 5+ devices

If you find any bugs, or would like to recommend any modification, please email the developer directly, requests made from within the comments will not be action-ed.

Please note, settings can only be accessed by the Android Wear App on your phone/tablet.
recentChanges: Version 7 Update - Cleaned up the Config screen and tidied up the code to improve battery performance.
